title: रेतीले तूफान के पुराने वीडियो को जमीन पर बादल रुकने के दावे से साझा किया गया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: The clouds in Xinjiang China fell to the ground! The truck drivers are afraid to move forward(due to the water vapor in the cloud being too heavy).This natural phenomenon is very rare pic.twitter.com/B3alndxMkG
